briefTitle: Retrospective Data Collection on the Use of Motiva Flora TE in Breast Reconstruction
officialTitle: Retrospective Data Collection on the Use of Motiva Flora TE in Breast Reconstruction
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patient has completed a tissue expander-based breast reconstruction with the Motiva Flora® TE .
* Patient has been informed correctly according to to the applicable national and local regulations.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Not applicable
